candidates.description: Minimal single-file prototype that imports CameraManager + LandmarkRawManager, consumes 'landmark:raw' events and renders 21 landmarks onto a 2D canvas overlay (plus a coordinate table). Low complexity and easy to extend to a dual-view by adding a second canvas/pane for smoothed landmarks.

Three.js overlay demo wiring CameraManager -> LandmarkRawManager -> LandmarkSmoothManager. Raw frames are forwarded into the smoother and smoothed output is rendered as 3D spheres + line mesh â€” demonstrates raw->smooth pipeline and richer rendering.
CameraManager prototype that emits camera:params and camera:frame events and can run in 'synthetic' mode. Useful as a standalone source to feed LandmarkRawManager.
candidates.snippet: appendLog({ event: 'camera:params', source: 'synthetic', width: w, height: h, fps: fpsVal, timestamp: new Date().toISOString() });

recommended_base.why: Single-file, low-complexity demo that already imports CameraManager + LandmarkRawManager, consumes landmark:raw and draws on a 2D canvas. Adding a right-hand smoothed view that subscribes to 'landmark:smoothed' is straightforward.
